mapper.select: SELECT E.ID, E.NAME, E.LASTNAME, (SELECT COUNT (D.ID) FROM DONATIONS D WHERE D.ID_CAMPAIGN = TE.ID_CAMPAIGN AND D.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID) TOTALDONATIONS, (SELECT SUM (D.AMOUNT) FROM DONATIONS D WHERE D.ID_CAMPAIGN = TE.ID_CAMPAIGN AND D.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID) TOTALAMOUNTDONATIONS, (SELECT COUNT (D.ID_TYPE_PAY) FROM DONATIONS D WHERE D.ID_CAMPAIGN = TE.ID_CAMPAIGN AND D.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID AND D.ID_TYPE_PAY =1) CREDITTYPE, (SELECT SUM (DR.PRODUCTIVE_HOURS) FROM DAILY_RECORDS DR WHERE DR.ID_CAMPAIGN = TE.ID_CAMPAIGN AND DR.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID) TOTALPRODUCTIVEHOURS, (SELECT SUM (DR.NON_PRODUCTIVE_HOURS) FROM DAILY_RECORDS DR WHERE DR.ID_CAMPAIGN = TE.ID_CAMPAIGN AND DR.ID_EMPLOYEE_TEAM = E.ID) TOTALNONPRODUCTIVEHOURS, TE.INITIAL_DATE INITIALDATE, TE.FINAL_DATE FINALDATE FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN TEAM_EMPLOYEES TE ON TE.ID_EMPLOYEE = E.ID WHERE TE.ID_CAMPAIGN = #{idCampaign}
